source_setting.source: SELECT u.* from (select * from patent.patent where id=10524402)p  join patent.uspatentcitation u on p.id = u.patent_id where year(p.date)=2020 order by u.uuid limit {limit} offset {offset};
source_setting.count_source: SELECT count(1) from (select * from patent.patent where id=10524402)p  join patent.uspatentcitation u on p.id = u.patent_id where year(p.date)=2020
